name: FairPlay Consulting
goal:
FairPlay Consulting is an international management consulting, whose activities focus on Corporate Strategy, Sales and Marketing, Organisation, Business development and Public Affairs.
FPC monitors, studies and analyses EU policy developments affecting his client's industries. FPC inform its client of those developments and their potential impact on their Business. Where appropriate, FPC provides information and makes representations to the EU institutions on behalf of its clients
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Environment
Digital policy
Energy policy
Internal Market
Climate action
Transport policy
